SEARCH
Package controller

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
controller.GameController
All Implemented Interfaces:
MouseListener, MouseMotionListener, Runnable, EventListener
public class GameController extends Object implements Runnable, MouseListener, MouseMotionListener
The GameController class handles the core game mechanics, including animation, event handling, collision detection, and interaction between game entities such as zombies, peashooters, and suns. It implements the Runnable interface to allow continuous updating of the game state in a separate thread, and it also listens to mouse events for user interaction.
